text: Maurice Brun (2 July 1925 – 5 August 2021) was a French politician. He was mayor of Montluçon from 1972 to 1977 and as a Deputy from 1973 to 1978. Brun was born in Montluçon. Brun died on 5 August 2021 in Allier, France, aged 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Maurice Brun
